introduction: This tool allows you to plan your public transport journeys using an interactive time-space diagram, based on live timetable data (currently Germany only).
interchanges_explanation: You need to enter all potential interchange stations (up to 10). Only direct connections between these stations will be found.
data_retrieval_waiting: Data retrieval can take up to one minute.
error_http_400: Origin or destination does not exist or does not have any arrivals/departures.
error_http_502: Failed requesting timetable data. Requested time might be too far in the future or past or other request parameters might be invalid.
error_http_503: Failed requesting timetable data. Possibly too many requests. Try again later.
error_unknown: Connection to server failed. Are you offline?
tip_0: If you click on a connection, the shortest route from origin to destination via this connection is highlighted in blue.
tip_1: Leave the date/time unset and create a bookmark of the diagram page in order to easily always access the current diagram.
tip_2: Use the arrows appearing above and below selected connections to find earlier arrivals and later departures from the respective stations.
